subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Gina Stechert of Germany captured her first World Cup victory Saturday in a downhill at Tarvisio, Italy, edging Lindsay Vonn by one hundredth of a second and denying Vonn a chance to set a United States women’s record of 19 Cup victories. Stechert completed the Prampero course in 1 minute 59.94 seconds. Anja Paerson of Sweden was 0.39 back in third.
